Type Parameters:
S - DSL handle for caller
R - DSL handle for the return DSL Verb/type.
All Implemented Interfaces:
CallableWithinProcessDefinition
public class CallProcessConsumer<S extends CallProcessConsumer<S,R>,R> extends ProcessDslBase<S,R> implements CallableWithinProcessDefinition
DSL class for calling a process consumer request or response handlers

  • Method Details

    • withRequestPreparation

      public S withRequestPreparation(CompositeProcessStepRequestExtractor requestPreparation)
      Attaches a CompositeProcessStepRequestExtractor that allows to manipulate the request for this call.
      Parameters:
      requestPreparation - the extractor for the request
      Returns:
      DSL handle

    • withResponseHandling

      public R withResponseHandling(CompositeProcessStepResponseConsumer responseConsumer)
      Attaches a CompositeProcessStepResponseConsumer that allows to manipulate the response of this consumer call.

      This is a terminal operation that will finish the definition of this consumer call.

      Parameters:
      responseConsumer - Consumer that handles the response
      Returns:
      DSL handle

    • withNoResponseHandling

      public R withNoResponseHandling()
      Declares that no specific response handling is required for this call. If the consumer provides a response, it will not be modified.
      Returns:
      DSL handle
